name: Crossing (Katie Green)
description:
A game about death, cats, and roads. 

  • Originally published at UCSC's open Studio in March 2016. 
  • Awarded the 2016 UCSC Book Arts Award by Donna and Peter Thomas.
  • I enjoy (and Do Not enjoy) many things about this looking back, but I am probably not going to do anything to this project in particular anymore 
  • When I played this again in 2019, I mostly see a patient frustration with existence. Also animation errors.
  • It lags loading new scenes but other than that it plays fine. You know what I didn't want to cut up my massive background images into smaller more manageable sections. Time isn't something I had much of in grad school. 
  • You wanna see the first few pages of a very strange, confusing abandoned comic I made using similar iconography and themes?
  • Made with Unity
